name: Poltergeist
overview: Poltergeist is a top down side-scrolling adventure game inspired by Valhalla and the Lord of Infinity. The action menu includes investigation, hand, inventory, map and spell book icons. Defeating Poltergeist and his supporters (Witch and Danghor - guardians of first two stages: Dark Castle, Danghor's Stronghold) requires finding numerous items or spells and using them in the right places or performing tasks assigned by encountered characters. Objects names and characters dialogues are introduced as digitalized samples.
